topic.title: Release the Plugin

note.p: Keep in mind that you are able to perform all the tests on our Demo instance before publishing your plugin to JetBrains Marketplace.

topic.p: Once everything is done, you are ready to start the release process.

li.p: Make sure that you have an Organization and that you have submitted your banking information under the Vendor Information tab.

tip.p: If you don’t see the tab for banking information, contact our Support Team marketplace@jetbrains.com.

li.p: If this is your initial release, upload the plugin to JetBrains Marketplace.
If you are switching the model from being a free plugin to paid/freemium, upload an update.

warning.p: Make sure that your plugin meets all the requirements and that you’ve correctly specified the plugin version and release date.

li.p: If you have not already done so, transfer the plugin to your Organization by going to the plugin overview page and clicking the Transfer to Organization button:

tip.p: If this button is not available, make sure that you specified the Organization ID correctly. Keep in mind that your Organization ID may differ from your Organization Name.

li.p: Go to the Sales Info tab on the Plugin page and press the Add to Marketplace button to fill in the sales details.

tip.p: If you don’t see this button, please make sure you specified your banking information under the Vendor Information tab for your Organization.

li.p: Be careful when filling out this form. We recommend checking out our Pricing Guidelines and details on the supported Licensing Schemes.

tip.p: Add an annual billing period if you're planning to support free community programs.

li.p: If some fields need to be changed after submission, write to the Marketplace Team at marketplace@jetbrains.com.
Below the sales details, you can select any community discounts you want your plugin to offer.
Keep in mind that free community programs require an annual billing period. To enable it, contact our Support Team at marketplace@jetbrains.com.

Once these steps have been performed, we will review your plugin within two business days. You will receive a notification as soon as the status of the review changes or if there are any questions regarding the approval of your plugin.
